title: Systems Engineer
description: I started at Helth Secretary of Colima at May of 2024 as Systems Engineer. My role her is to develop and implement a solution to start digitized the most important documents.

Currently, I'm working on a system that shows all the '.pdf' files in a directory shared by network. The strcuture of directories and subdirectories are named strategically in a way that each folder is a topic that the files belongs to.
This records are usefull to find quickly any file as well as the responsible of that file. It is a simple system but powerfull for future searches.

title: Systems Engineer
description: I was member of the J&J team, primarily focused on assisting the development team in configuring information in the Camstar platform. My role involved leveraging Excel-based information on medical devices to tailor the system to the production team's needs.

Utilizing Scrum methodology, our tasks and activities were successfully completed, followed by rigorous testing by the QA team. In case of any issue identified during this process, my team and I went back to work into the task to get it done.

Also, sometimes I helpedto my lead to test some configuration in the platform using basicSQL queries that let us identify for wrong outputs or if theproduction team's needed a new configuration, we had to create a newquery to tailor the system to the production team's needs.
